eu_initiatives:
Revision of Airport Charges Directive 
Possible revision of EU Regulation 261/2004
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
IBAR's current membership consists in more than 50 airlines operating in Italy and representing approximately 70% of the total air traffic in Italy in terms of both aircraft movements and passengers carried. 
The main tasks of the Association are : 
To encourage, promote, safeguard the interests of the airline industry. 
To Ensure that EU directives/regulations are duly implemented by the local authorities. 
Keep our members up to date with regard to industrial and governmental developments that may affect their ability to conduct business. 
Advise  our members on political , fiscal and regulatory matters. 
Ensure that the local media are well informed on the positions of the Air Industry community. 
 
 
Lastly , the Association strictly abides by Antitrust regulations and does not involve itself in any matters of commercial nature that may be of interest for its individual Members
